name: Mars Marine (TastySnak)
description:
Mars Marine

Activate the power stations to survive being overwhelmed by the Martian presence!

The arachnids are formidable!  Can you survive without being hit by the Martian foes?  How much of your health remains if you survive?

Your objectives are to find the power stations and activate them, then return to your base alive!

====================

Credits for material not created by Tasty Snak

"Player, Alien, Environment, and some sound effects by GameDevTV
"Star Wars: Geonosis Build Prop." (https://skfb.ly/o6Uuo) by HammerWorks
"RTS Airport (Test)" (https://skfb.ly/6pOsI) by Sabri Ayeş
"Bunker model" (https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/infantry-bunker-model-1188999) by Starship Mesher
"Turret - Game Ready" (https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/free-turret-pbr-unity-3d-model/932423) by MeshMagnet
"Minigun Sound effect." (https://freesound.org/people/Seidhepriest/sounds/611449/) by Seidhepriest
Music from the Mega Game Music Collection | Epic Games Marketplace

====================

Controls

WASD to move.  Mouse to aim.  Left mouse button to shoot.

====================

Install Instructions

Step 1: Download zipped file.
Step 2: Extract to hard drive.
Step 3: Double click executable to run.
